content.rendered:
Directed by Surender Reddy.

Written by Vema Reddy. Surender Reddy. A. Deepakraj. Madhusudhan. Shivgopal Krishna.

Cast Ram Charan Teja(K. Dhruva IPS). Arvind Swami(Siddharth Abhimanyu / Venkanna). Rakul Preet Singh(Ishika). Navdeep(Gowtham IPS). Krishna Murali Posani(Ch. Chengala Rayudu). Sayaji Shinde(Dheeraj Chandra). Abhinaya(Scientist Akshara). Nassar(Minister). Farah Karimaee(Preethi). Ali Reza(Ranveer Singh IPS). Randhir Gatla(Karan IPS). Sourav Chakraborty(Abbas Ali). Madhusudhan Rao(Irfan Ali (as V. Madhusudhan Rao)) . Olga Andrievskaya(Dancer). Rajsekhar Aningi(Police Informer).Indrasena. Prashant Karthi(Police). Ram Karthik(Kamal).Tori Lao-Lee. Jabardasth Naveen(Corrupt Cop). Ramana Reddy(Chain Snatcher). Chatrapathi Sekhar(Chain snatcher). Markus Waldow(Business Partner)

Language Telugu.

Producers Allu Aravind. Ayan. Sahni Bob. Prasad N.V.. V.Y. Praveenkumar.

Production Geetha Arts.
